Computer Science Research

Luca Pinello Lab

Data Science Intern

June 2020 - Present

pinellolab.org

Located at Massachusetts General Hospital (MGH) Cancer Center, Harvard University.

Applied python (pandas) in Jupyter Notebooks, for STREAM analysis of hematopoietic scRNA-seq data. Prepared dataset uploaded to singlecellvr.com ’kowalczyk2015-stream”’ in GitHub. Developed notebook for RNA-velocity data preparation/configuration on singlecellvr.com (can be viewed here on the singlecellvr repository).

Article under review Stein, D., Chen, H., Vinyard, M., Qin, Q., Combs, R.D., Zhang, Q., Pinello, L. SinglecellVR: interactive visualization of single-cell data in virtual reality (Computational Genomics, Frontiers in Bioinformatics).

↓ Kowalczyk Dataset Findings

Nancy Kanwisher Lab

Summer Intern

May 2018 - August 2018

kanwisherlab.org

Located at the Picower Institute for Learning and Memory, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT).

Applied HTML and python graphical user interfaces (GUIs) to develop digital oscillator. Web based app can be used for human memory color analysis.

Biology Research

Biogen

Wet-lab biologist

June 2018

biogencommunitylab.com

Located in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Applied PCR to A.victoria jellyfish blue fluorescent protein (BFP) cDNA for site-directed mutagenesis (Y66H). Modification turned BFP to green fluorescent protein (GFP). Performed bacteria transformation, gel electrophoresis (agarose and PAGE), chemiluminescence, and spectrophotometry. Used for cell visualization. Lab Director: Dr. Alazar Ayele

BioBuilder Biology Research Epicenter

Wet-lab biologist

February 2020

biobuilder.org

Located in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Applied PCR to S.cerevisiae yeast DNA. Identified colonies with β-carotene producing gene (crtYB). Applied restriction digest and gel electrophoresis. Used to identify yeast culture that fortifies bread with Vitamin A. Lab Director: Dr. Vivek Bajaj
